page.title: 19The United Reformed Church
page.content: There is one United Reformed Church in Hassocks whose minister is the Rev. D. Piggins. Every Monday Girls Bridage is held which is for girls of 5 years and upwards. It is held in the church hall. On Tuesday they have a women's meeting at the church hall. On Thursday there is a midweek service, followed by coffee. On Fridays they have two clubs, one called Pilots and the other one is called Friday Youth Group. Every month they have an elders' meeting, then a week later they have a church meeting.
